titleStmt.title: The Charge of a Tory plot maintain'd in a dialogue between the Observator, Heraclitus, and an inferior clergy-man at the Towzer-Tavern : wherein the first discourse publish'd under that title is vindicated from the trifling animadversions of the Observator, and the accusation justified / by the same author.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for N.L., to be sold by Richard Janeway,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A dialogue between Observator, Heraclitus, and an inferiour clergy-man.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
